Name: Detailed Scores
I want: to be able to see all the scores categorized properly based on name, time and opponent
So that: I can be able to reflect on the scores in a more specific way which will give a better insight on my capabilities
IMPL Details: Create a new view asking the user for a name at the end of a game then getting the time and opponent of said game and saving it in the high-scores list categorized

Name: Game Over
I want: the game to end when musketeers are in the same row
So that: the guards get the win when they achieve that
IMPL Details: Fix a part of isGameOver that checks if all musketeers are in the same row so the game ends when that occurs

Name: Timer
So that: I can see how long it takes me to win a game against a computer
IMPL Details: Use a StopWatch class in order to keep track of the time that has passed since the game started, and use another class in order to display the time to the user. Feature will be implemented using an observer design pattern

Name: High Scores
I want: to have my high scores saved
IMPL Details: After each game ends, a factory will determine what kind of game was just played, and create a high score object accordingly. This will use a factory pattern implementation as after the game ends a factory class is called in order to determine what kind of high score is being created

Name: Setting names
I want: To set a name for myself in the game
So that: When it is my turn in the game the computer can tell me by displaying my name and I will know it is my turn
IMPL Details: Using the strategy pattern I will create abstract classes agent and depending on the type of player and the game mode let the user enter any name they want or set a name for the computer agents

Name: Undo button
I want: to be able to create an efficant undo button
So that: Undo a move if I made a mistake
IMPL Details: Using the memento pattern create an undo button with a new memento class which saves the moves states

Name: Selecting icons
I want: To select an icon for myself before playing the game
So that: The game becomes more user interactive and allows the players to have their own icon and verse another icon
IMPL Details: Using linkedLists and storing the image icons in nodes and letting the user tranverse though the linked lists  before selecting a node/icon
